metadata.title: CVE-2018-5145 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox ESR 52.6. These bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.7 and Thunderbird < 52.7.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine chrisccoulson> It's not clear whether this affects mozjs52, as the bugs are still private and some aren't referenced by any changesets. The following need investigating: - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1348955

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
